actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay certain judgments in favor of the Iowa Tribes of Oklahoma and of Kansas and Nebraska.

summary.text: Provides for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay a judgement by the Indian Claims Commission in docket numbered 135 in favor of the Iowa Tribes of Oklahoma and of Kansas and Nebraska.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay certain judgments in favor of the Iowa Tribes of Oklahoma and of Kansas and Nebraska.
